title: Daahrien's Active and Operational
description: Daahrien's Active and Operational is a Scifi Horror game set in an abandoned space ship. After activating the dormant A.I. there, escaping it has become your top priority. Fix the ship corrupt systems, adapt to extreme life-or-death situations, hide from them..
longDescription:
<!--image-->
![Daahrien's Active and Operational-1bc41](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/f1c9c27c2eef4b2fb367715fa916b758/daahriens-active-and-operational-1bc41.png)

<!--image-->
![Daahrien's Active and Operational-10y4c](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/f1c9c27c2eef4b2fb367715fa916b758/daahriens-active-and-operational-10y4c.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
You're trapped in a seemingly abandoned ship. Your options limited. An AI going rogue and a mystery to unfold. To survive you have to use anything you can get your hands on.

**Hide, run... think.**

<!--image-->
![Daahrien's Active and Operational-v4fdh](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/f1c9c27c2eef4b2fb367715fa916b758/daahriens-active-and-operational-v4fdh.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Extremely intelligent enemy AI** that learns from the player actions.

Confront many unique incredible intelligent enemies. Some can be stopped for some time, and some can even be killed. Most of them won't go down though so plan accordingly and **avoid conflict when possible.**

They learn from you and will adapt to your playstyle. They may even share knowledge with the other ones. Forcing you to adapt as well.

Permanent changes stay on them, like blinding them for good and they will be like that next time you find them.

<!--image-->
![Daahrien's Active and Operational-v2242](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/f1c9c27c2eef4b2fb367715fa916b758/daahriens-active-and-operational-v2242.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
There are a lot of useful things around. **Collect, or craft your own**, and use them to open new areas, treat your injuries, place traps for your enemies, or even confront them directly.

**Remember they learn from you!** Adapt too.

<!--image-->
![Daahrien's Active and Operational-1xwmi](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/f1c9c27c2eef4b2fb367715fa916b758/daahriens-active-and-operational-1xwmi.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
With so many secrets in the ship. You have no other option but to uncover its insides deeply. Solve its riddles in the form of machines, cryptic symbolism, hidden locations and any other obstacle that you encounter unexpectedly.

<!--image-->
![Daahrien's Active and Operational-9oqrd](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/f1c9c27c2eef4b2fb367715fa916b758/daahriens-active-and-operational-9oqrd.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Who is the **mysterious masked person**? What happened before you got involved in this horrying place? Are there answers?

Suddenly you are in strange places.

With the randomization of everything from item spawning, puzzle solutions; A big map with several branches; So many enemies with unpredictable behaviour that learns from you; **no play-through is the same even for the same player.**

<!--image-->
![Daahrien's Active and Operational-1vbat](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/f1c9c27c2eef4b2fb367715fa916b758/daahriens-active-and-operational-1vbat.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
"This game features explicit, violent, disturbing, and extremely terrifying content."

<!--image-->
![Daahrien's Active and Operational-hz2kj](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/f1c9c27c2eef4b2fb367715fa916b758/daahriens-active-and-operational-hz2kj.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
In the... I wand..r. In teh... I hidd.. In tih... I eat b...

**The answers are outside.**
